page.title: 05Industry in Ferryhill
page.content: The industries within our area are {1.Steetley.}This company mines an extensive limestone-dolomite quarry.The product is high quality and frequently exported. {2.NEECOL.}Small firm dealing in constructinal engineering.Faces great competition in present economic climate. {3.Lazenby.}Small building contractors. {4.Bairdsware.}Clothing manufacture.At present moment expanding. There are other small family businesses i.e.Blamire Printers,Mac Joiners,Dee Transport but these employ few workers. Unemployment is prevalent in this area.
